sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.UninstallScheduledJob</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Application uninstall handler. See attributes on table sysauto.</description>
        <name>UninstallScheduledJob</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var UninstallScheduledJob = Class.create();
UninstallScheduledJob.prototype = {
    uninstall: function(sysID, appID, tableName) {
		// temporarily turn on the workflow as we need the "automation synchronizer" business rule
		// (sys_id:5f0749c70a0a0a6501c216a1dd3c10f7) to clean up the related sys_trigger records
		var originalWorkflow = GlideSession.get().getWorkflow();
		GlideSession.get().setWorkflow(true);
		var gr = new GlideRecord(tableName);
		if (gr.get(sysID) && gr.getValue('sys_scope') == appID)			
			gr.deleteRecord();
		
		GlideSession.get().setWorkflow(originalWorkflow);
    },

    type: 'UninstallScheduledJob'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2016-08-17 22:54:14</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>5bae6fa15311220097c8a464aec5875a</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>UninstallScheduledJob</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Automated Action Interface" source="com.snc.automation">0bcc74836d2220100acb70b3534330bc</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_5bae6fa15311220097c8a464aec5875a</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2016-08-17 22:59:20</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>635</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
